Changelog¶

All notable changes to this project will be documented in this file. See standard-version for commit guidelines.

5.0.2 (2019-11-25)¶

Chore¶

  • add the funding field in package.json

5.0.1 (2019-11-25)¶

Bug Fixes¶

  • name of esModule option in source code (#346) (31d6589)

5.0.0 (2019-11-22)¶

BREAKING CHANGES¶

  • minimum required nodejs version is 10.13.0

  • rename the esModules option to esModule

  • switch to ES modules by default (the option esModule is true by default)

4.3.0 (2019-11-21)¶

Features¶

  • new esModules option to output ES modules (#340) (9b9cd8d)

4.2.0 (2019-08-07)¶

Features¶

  • postTransformPublicPath option (#334) (c136f44)

4.1.0 (2019-07-18)¶

Features¶

  • improved validation error messages (#339) (705eed4)

4.0.0 (2019-06-05)¶

chore¶

  • deps: update (#333) (0d2f9b8)

BREAKING CHANGES¶

  • deps: minimum required nodejs version is 8.9.0

3.0.1 (2018-12-20)¶

Bug Fixes¶

  • relax options validation for additional properties (#309) (c74d44e)

3.0.0 (2018-12-20)¶

Code Refactoring¶

  • drop support for webpack < 4 (#303) (203a4ee)

  • more validations in options schema

Features¶

  • resourcePath is now available in outputPath and publicPath (#304) (0d66e64)

  • context is now available in outputPath and publicPath (#305) (d5eb823)

BREAKING CHANGES¶

  • removed the useRelativePath option. It is dangerously and break url when you use multiple entry points.

  • drop support for webpack < 4

2.0.0 (2018-08-21)¶

Code Refactoring¶

  • defaults: update to latest webpack-defaults (#268) (687f422)

BREAKING CHANGES¶

  • defaults: Enforces engines of "node": ">=6.9.0 < 7.0.0 || >= 8.9.0"

1.1.11 (2018-03-01)¶

Reverts¶

  • index: context takes precedence over issuer.context (options.useRelativePath) (#260) (e73131f)

1.1.10 (2018-02-26)¶

Bug Fixes¶

  • package: add webpack >= 4 (peerDependencies) (#255) (3a6a7a1)

1.1.9 (2018-02-21)¶

Bug Fixes¶

  • index: handle protocol URL’s correctly (options.publicPath) (#253) (54fa5a3)

  • index: use path.posix for platform consistency (#254) (2afe0af)

1.1.8 (2018-02-20)¶

Bug Fixes¶

  • index: context takes precedence over issuer.context (options.useRelativePath) (3b071f5)

  • index: don’t append outputPath to the original url (options.outputPath {Function}) (4c1ccaa)

  • index: normalize and concat paths via path.join() (26e47ca)

1.1.7 (2018-02-19)¶

Bug Fixes¶

  • index: don’t concat options.outputPath and options.publicPath (#246) (98bf052)

1.1.6 (2017-12-16)¶

Bug Fixes¶

  • rootContext compatibility fix for legacy / v4 (#237) (1e4b7cf), closes #237

1.1.5 (2017-10-05)¶

Bug Fixes¶

  • schema: allow name to be a {Function} (options.name) (#216) (fbfb160)

1.1.4 (2017-09-30)¶

Bug Fixes¶

  • index: revert to CJS exports (#212) (f412b3e)

1.1.3 (2017-09-30)¶

1.1.2 (2017-09-30)¶

Bug Fixes¶

  • cjs: export raw value (#183) (daeff0e)

1.1.1 (2017-09-30)¶

Bug Fixes¶

  • schema: allow additionalProperties (#207) (cf7c85a)

1.1.0 (2017-09-29)¶

Features¶

  • add options validation (schema-utils) (#184) (696ca77)

1.0.0 (2017-07-26)¶

Bug Fixes¶

  • remove = from default export (SyntaxError) (#178) (3fe2d12)

Code Refactoring¶

  • Upgrade to defaults 1.3.0 (#170) (632ed72)

  • Apply webpack-defaults (#167) (632ed72)

BREAKING CHANGES¶

  • Enforces Webpack standard NodeJS engines range. at the time of merge >= 4.3 < 5.0.0 || >= 5.10.

1.0.0-rc.0 (2017-07-26)¶

Bug Fixes¶

  • remove = from default export (SyntaxError) (#178) (3fe2d12)

1.0.0-beta.1 (2017-06-09)¶

Code Refactoring¶

  • Upgrade to defaults 1.3.0 (#170) (632ed72)

1.0.0-beta.0 (2017-06-07)¶

Code Refactoring¶

  • Apply webpack-defaults (#167) (632ed72)

BREAKING CHANGES¶

  • Enforces Webpack standard NodeJS engines range. at the time of merge >= 4.3 < 5.0.0 || >= 5.10.

0.11.2 (2017-06-05)¶

Bug Fixes¶

  • index: allow to override publicPath with an empty string (#145) (26ab81a)

  • init publicPath to undefined (#159) (e4c0b2a)

0.11.1 (2017-04-01)¶

Bug Fixes¶

  • outputPath function overriden by useRelativePath (#139) (80cdee2)

0.11.0 (2017-03-31)¶

Features¶

  • Emit files with relative urls (#135) (dbcd6cc)

0.10.1 (2017-02-25)¶

Bug Fixes¶

  • getOptions: deprecation warn in loaderUtils (#129) (a8358a0)

0.10.0 (2017-01-28)¶

Features¶

  • resources: specify custom public file name (6833c70)

Change Log¶

All notable changes to this project will be documented in this file. See standard-version for commit guidelines.
